abstract.t: This document specifies an extension to the multicast addressingarchitecture of the IPv6 protocol. The extension allows for singinterface-ID to allocate multicast addresses. When the link-localunicast address is configured at each interface of host, interfaceID is uniquely determined. By delegating multicast addresses atthe same time as interface ID, each host can identify theirmulticast addresses automatically at Layer 1 without needing to runan intra- or inter-domain allocation protocol in the serverlessenvironments.
